ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] UseFUL songs...
ygData.msgSnippet: I used this song till lvl 50 (verses of victory) and still consider using it sometimes.  It is a str/dex/AC buff which stacks with pretty much every buff spell
ygData.messageBody:
I used this song till lvl 50 (verses of victory) and still consider using it
sometimes. It is a str/dex/AC buff which stacks with pretty much every buff
spell out there. There are times where you will best serve your group by
banging away Chant of Battle on your Bongos...

Lvl 2: CHords of discord:
Area of effect DOT song. Greatly enhanced by using a stringed instrument.
You will actually find this song more useful once you get to lvl 18 and want
to do an all instruement attack with this, Hymm and the lvl 18 AOE DOT. It
damages scale well, and eventually it comes close to the damage of the
higher lvl DOT songs.

Elfson Allegro 52 Veeshan
